tool.name: Filter by abundance
tool.description: Trims fastq/fasta sequences at k-mers of a given abundance based on a provided k-mer counting table.
tool.command: mkdir output; cd output; filter-abund.py $variable_coverage $presencetable_to_load #for input in $inputs $input #end for

param.name: inputs
param.label: FAST[AQ] file(s)
param.help: Put in order of precedence such as longest reads first.

param.name: variable_coverage
param.label: Variable coverage
param.help: Only trim when a sequence has high enough coverage (median abundance > 20)

param.name: presencetable_to_load
param.label: the khmer abundance table to load
param.help: The inputs file(s) will be processed using the kmer counts in the specified k-mer counting table file.
